long_description: Bend, stretch and breathe your way to a more tranquil state of mind in the Patagonia Pliant tights. Nylon blend in a substantial, stretchy knit offers great shape retention, strength and comfort; plus, it wicks moisture and dries fast. Side seams are angled to prevent chafing, and gusseted crotch enhances mobility and comfort. Small pocket in waistband secures small items. Patagonia Pliant tights feature a low-rise, flattering waistband and slightly flared, boot-leg hems.
short_description: Bend, stretch and breathe your way to a more tranquil state of mind in the Patagonia Pliant tights.
